Recruit Slots 1-3.description:
Want a new recruit on your team? You can buy your first slots for this price!

✦ All three of these slots come together in a bundle, you get all three for 2,000p!
✦ In order to recruit a Pokemon from a completed dungeon, you must have Team Slots purchased and open!
✦ Recruit Slots have to be purchased in order, starting here with 1- 3!
